thread.title: Film on Gujarat salt workers bags Vatavaran film fest award
thread.title_full: Film on Gujarat salt workers bags Vatavaran film fest award - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Film on Gujarat salt workers bags Vatavaran film fest award
text:
*Mumbai-based Farida Pachas "My name is Salt" and German-Italian film "Last Call" have bagged the best film award in Indian and international categories respectively at the ongoing CMS Vatavaran film festival here.*
The International film festival for environment and wildlife conservation, which is in its 8th edition had ... Â»
